website_summaries.verdict: While a high-quality sleeping bag, you may wish to consider another option if you're planning on camping frequently in the cold.
pros: Lightweight and comfortable, with a silky inner lining
Can be separated into two separate bags
cons: Hard to get the sleeping bag back into its storage bag
Material seems very thin, with little insulation

customer_reviews.title: Excellency in form of a sleeping bag
customer_reviews.text: Coming from the military, i love this bag. It has everything i’m used too and more. Insulation is great. zippers are high quality, and even protected by a velcro strap (picture posted) fits myself and my wife, perfectly. i posted a few pics to show how big this bag really is. i’m 6”2’ 205lbs and i have 0 trouble getting in and out. The bag unzips all the way to the point where you can have two huge flaps to lay on. For storage, it doesn’t take too much room and it’s really easy to put away into its sleeve. Honestly i couldn’t have asked for more. It met my expectations and some. Thank you for making a great product
customer_reviews.author: Hugo Palma

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Warm, Cozy, Soft.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Warm, Cozy, Soft. After opening this in my house to "try out", I ended up sleeping with it. Its so warm and soft it was better than my regular blanket. It comes in a very kool bag, it has these straps around it, so after you stuff it back in, you can adjust the straps to make it tighter and more compact, also doubles as a handle so its easy to carry or strap it to a back-pack. It also comes with these 2 little pillows, I plan to keep it in my car, very good for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Chaya W

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality for the price! Super Cozy!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly cannot say enough good things about this bag! I tried shopping locally for just a couple cheap bags, and was super disappointed with the quality for the price. I decided to take a gamble and trust amazon reviews and I am so glad I did! the material is soft and warm, the size is plenty long for taller people and its a nice amount of room for two people to cuddle at night :) I am so pleased with this bag i plan on purchasing another later on in the summer for our friends.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, quality sleeping bag.
customer_reviews.text: This sleeping bag is fantastic! We'd previously purchased a double sleeping bag from a different company, and immediately returned it due to poor quality. This sleeping bag was in the same price range, but much better made. It's lightweight, warm, and I love that the bottom extends out a little bit to keep your head from resting on the ground. Overall, I'm really happy with this purchase and can't wait to use it more!
customer_reviews.author: David S Green

customer_reviews.title: Woke Up Cold
customer_reviews.text: I took this sleeping bag camping in Oregon where it was in the 40s at night. It definitely did not live up to the description for cold climate conditions. I had to buy another blanket to put inside of the sleeping bag to avoid waking up shivering. The pillows it comes with are very small & basically useless. I have no idea how this item has such good reviews & would not recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel N.

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Double Sleeping Bag
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a Double Wide sleeping bag, then you need to check this one. It is very well designed with nice features like Velcro to hold the top area closed throughout the night so the zipper will not be able to move on its own. They even give you two pillows which all fit into the included caring pouch. It is listed to keep you warm down to 32 degrees. It can easy fit two adults or if you just want a lot of room then it will be perfect for that also :-) I hope this review and my included video help with your decision. GrandpaJake
customer_reviews.author: 🎄 GrandpaJake 🎄

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Update: the seller reached out to me and issued a full refund for this bag. The description says this bag is rated for 32 F and above, but we used it a few weeks ago when it was in low- to mid-50’s and I kept waking up because my feet were cold (very unusual for me). Also, the pillows that come with this are so thin and flimsy, I would rather use the pillows our kids’ toddler sleeping bags came with. The material inside feels the same as on the outside, which traps heat, but also made it feel humid and muggy. Maybe that’s why I ended up getting cold! Not a fan of this sleeping bag at all.
customer_reviews.author: Vera

customer_reviews.title: NOT A COLD WEATHER SLEEPING BAG!
customer_reviews.text: This sleeping bag is soft and lightweight. Comfortable for summer camping only! NOT FOR 32 degree weather! I used it for the first time two days ago and we almost froze to death and the weather was 43 degrees! NO WAY is this true advertising!
customer_reviews.author: Go

customer_reviews.title: Check the measurements once you get it laid out.
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. Measurements weren't even close to what was described. Length wise and width wise. Crawled into the bag and loved every aspect of it but I sorta want what I paid for. My final measurements were 77" x 53". So bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny A Yatco

customer_reviews.title: Is not a durable option
customer_reviews.text: Well this sleeping bag performed as most of reviews stated, my problem with it is that it is not practical if you are going to be camping for about a month and you need to wash it. Instructions say you can’t put in a top load agitation machine and you can not put in dryer. On the road this is not going to work to let it air dry! Waited and washed when we returned home, followed the instructions and let it air dry, the filling shifted and left some bare areas and others lumpy. I doubt that it would survive more than one more washing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, poor quality sleeping bags. These are not warm below 60 degrees!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, you get what you pay for. The zippers allow air to flow through them and these are not for cold weather at all as was stated in the specifications. We were in Estes Park, Colorado in early August and froze our butts off. Our next stop was West Yellowstone, so We had to go to a sporting goods store and buy bags that were rated for below 60 to 32 degrees. Also after washing the filling clumps up. No, I didn't put them in the dryer. I line dried them. Do not make the same mistake we did. These would be alright for hot summer camping.
customer_reviews.author: Noena808

customer_reviews.title: Just a Great Sleeping Bag
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Was big enough for me amd my Girlfriend to sleep comfortably and was plenty warm for the temp we were camping at which was about 47°F. The little pillows it came with were awesome and the carrying bag holds it well and seems sturdy. Love this sleeping bag for the the price and I would highly recommend it. I also DID NOT reciece a promotional coupon for an Amzon gift card in my packaging (like some other reviews mention) or received any compensation of any kimd for my positive review.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan harris

customer_reviews.title: cumbersome and heavier than I anticipated
customer_reviews.text: This is not a lightweight product despite being advertised as lightweight and for backpacking. I bought this for my wife and I. We have to separate it and carry it on the trail in 2 pieces which is a hassle because there is only 1 bag. Also the 2 pillows that come with it is just extra needles weight as the pillows are too thin and small to be worth it. On the plus side it is lightweight for being a double sleeping bag I guess, but it's just so cumbersome to pack and too heavy for 1 backpack. Luckily it can split into 2 bags and be easily set up at camp.
customer_reviews.author: David L.

customer_reviews.title: Overall, happy with it!
customer_reviews.text: We've now had a changes to use this a few times and overall I'm happy with it. I am a hot sleeper. So when we went camping and the nights went from 50 degrees down to 38-40 degrees as the low, this kept me warm. In fact while the temp was still above 45 I was too warm in it, especially with my wife sharing it. It is very light and easy to use. My personal preference is a sleeping bag with a fabric lining so I don't love the nylon lining on this.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: No way this is a 32 degree bag Internal lining is tolerable but not comfortable Zippers let cold air in
customer_reviews.author: EJTV

customer_reviews.title: Compact, keeps you warm in 50F+ weather
customer_reviews.text: This sleeping bag is light weight and very compact. It can roll back into its original draw-string bag easily, unlike most sleeping bags we have. It has zippers down both sides so when it's warm as you go to bed you can unzip and keep cool. Later on, when the temperature dips, you can zip it back up. We've slept in 50-60 degrees and it was quite comfortable, especially when you sleep with another person. It's also very roomy (we're small: under 200lbs). Two adults and a young child can all fit in it. The pillows that come with the bag are small, but that's not a big deal. We were buying a sleeping bag for camping, not pillows.
customer_reviews.author: W. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Camped in freezing cold weather and was perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I went camping in Big Bend National park in Texas. It was 31~40 degrees through out our whole stay. I know, not the best weather to go to this place. Anyways, the sleeping bag was pefect! it was warm, comfy, and there was enough room for both of us to sleep like at home. This is a great sleeping bag and the price is not bad at all. What we did was to put the sleeping bag on top of our air matress so we made sure we had some isolation from the cold of the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Camper's Bed
customer_reviews.text: I have used double sleeping bags for camping and bedding in my campers and boats for years. The Sleepingo Double Sleeping Bag fits perfect on the queen size gel foam mattress in my new truck camper and always looks nice. Easy in and Easy out for one or two people. Lived on boats for 12 years with a double sleeping bag on a foam mattress. No muss, no fuss with sheets and blankets. Sleeping bags are easily maintained by washing as necessary. In cold weather I sleep with a window cracked for fresh air and wear heavy socks and long underwear as necessary. Yes it's great for two as you adjust your undergarments and zipper on your side as necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: Snuggle bag
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I bought this great sleeping bag as part of our minivan to camper conversion and we could not be happier. First off the bag stores well thanks to the included compression sack. But as a two person sleeping bag it works perfectly for us. We spend many nights camping during our Colorado summers and this bag keeps us nice and warm even at altitude where temperatures can drop quickly at night. We've used the bag a lot since receiving it and it seems well built, I have no doubt it will last for years. Highly recommend this bag to anyone looking for a two person "snuggle bag" as my wife likes to call it.
customer_reviews.author: Daryle

customer_reviews.title: My husband loved this bag!
customer_reviews.text: He needed something for camping that was fairly lightweight but still warm, something that could be separated into two bags for when we're together, and something large enough when zipped together to be comfortable to move around in. This sleeping bag met all these criteria on all counts. He said it was very comfortable, perfect for what he needed, and the zippers worked well. The pillows may be useful to someone - he didn't find them particular helpful. Can't beat the price. I hope the manufacturer is able to keep it around this price point to make it affordable for people. Thank you for that!
customer_reviews.author: amelio

customer_reviews.title: Great value overall
customer_reviews.text: - Super inexpensive option! - Sleeps quite warm on nights above 60. (We use two sleepinggo inflatable sleep pads underneath.) (Will update for cooler nights.) - Lightweight enough to pack for shorter backpacking trips (spilt between 2 people). - Inner material is slightly less "sticky/sweaty" than the outer which is sufficient. If you're particular about fabrics it will probably suffice. - Unzips into two pieces - Can be used as individual sleeping bags - Velcro closure tabs snag easily on the thin material causing long pulls. I suggest cutting them off. They will snag the bag in the wash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best sleeping bag out there!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of the best sleeping bags out there. Took it for some wild camping in South Dakota. Hiked a couple miles carrying the bag. Its lightweight and can basically just strap on my backpack. Easy to set up and kept us warm throughout the night. It's big enough for two people to be really comfy but lightweight enough to be easily packed in the carrying bag. I've taken this sleeping bag on several camping trips, and I'll be taking it to more trips in the future. I always keep this bag in my car, since I often car camp during my photography trips!
customer_reviews.author: That One Dude

customer_reviews.title: Turn around and look else where!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that gets 5 stars is light weight. This sleeping bag is so thin I can see the light from my screen on my phone through it. The first night I got this bag, I turned off the heat in my house. It got down to 46 degrees and I was cold. I would never use this outdoors. As for the price, what a joke. You can get a better sleeping bag for cheaper and made better. Do not waste your money or your time.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!  If you have a problem, Coy’ll fix it.
customer_reviews.text: The owner of Sleepingo, Coy West, stands behind these bags. I had a problem with the zipper on mine, and since I’m happy with the bag, it’s everything I need, I fixed the problem myself. It covers the top of a queen mattress, a modern one. The owner contacted me and said he wanted to give me a full tefund, and didn’t want the bag back. I told him I didn’t want the refund, I’d fixed it. He gave me the full refund anyway. Anyway, I like the bag, and I’ll wear it out. Well, what can I say, everyone’s happy. I’ve got a great bag, fixed it to my satisfaction, and got a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: George fullwood

customer_reviews.title: Not warm
customer_reviews.text: just got back from a camping trip to glacier national park where it got down in the low 40s some nights. We liked the size of this double sleeping bag. However, it was not very warm at all. The inside is not made of warm cozy fabric and instead is slick fabric like the outside. The inside of the sleeping bag often reflected whatever temp it was outside of it, so we put multiple blankets on top to keep the heat in which worked better. Nonetheless, would not recommend this sleeping bag for staying warm, would be better in a warm climate when you just want a light blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: both me and my wife like to sleep with one leg bent up some
customer_reviews.text: Not quite big enough for two people, both me and my wife like to sleep with one leg bent up some, but it was warm enough with temps never dropping under 50s, the pillows were neat, and I didn't need to jump through any hoops to get it back in it's bag. I don't regret the purchase, even if we don't use it as a double, we can let two of our kids use it as singles, since each piece can be used as an individual sleeping bag. Well done.
customer_reviews.author: James Cornwell

customer_reviews.title: Great sleeping bag.  Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this product. It is a great sleeping bag, very comfortable, reasonably priced, and worth every penny. It is warm, easy to slip into and out of, with a full length zipper on each side, well crafted and should last us a long time. We have already used this sleeping bag once and are very glad we found it. Here in CT in the winter, the nights can be very cold so this bag really comes in handy. I am also impressed with how compact this bag is when stored in its bag. We strongly recommend this bag. You won't be disappointed. Bill
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great Warm/Cool Weather Sleeping Bag!
customer_reviews.text: This sleeping bag is fantastic! It's not designed for really cold weather, but if you're looking for a bag to use in the summer or cooler months it is more than up to the task. We use it for regular camping, also "car camping." Plenty of room for two, and I am 6'3" and always have trouble fitting. We've been using it for kayak camping, it rolls up easily (the storage sack, unlike most, is just the right size) and can be easily compacted and stowed. We usually take along a size-matched sherpa style blanket and are set for any temp. The sleeping bag also seems very well made with a nice green color. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Burban

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased and impressed!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I bought this for our canoeing camping trip along the Colorado River. First night camping it got down to 35 degrees and the sleeping bag kept us warm the whole night. It’s very light weight, easily rolls up and goes into storage bag. My wife and I are both 5’8 and there was plenty of leg room and ability for minimal rolling over. Second night we were in Utah, Zion National Park. It was in the 20s that night and only our faces and heads got cold. We did sleep in long-John’s and/or thermos. But again for the price of the sleeping bag we were very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Miami

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for Spring/Summer only
customer_reviews.text: Used it camping in Colorado in March, 2018. Weather was hovering just above freezing at night. Although it says it is rated to 32 degrees F, it is quite thin, so we had to use a flannel blanket in addition to the sleeping bag and we slept in full long sleeve/sweatpants -- this kept us warm. For East Coasters - probably not ideal to only use the sleeping bag for Winter/Fall camping (bring a blanket like me), it would be ideal for Summer camping though! **This review was updated after the seller reached out to me.**
customer_reviews.author: Jessica P

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT a cold weather sleeping bag. We froze!
customer_reviews.text: What I love about this bag is that it packs up small, which is very important for us camping from our motorcycles. However, this is 3 season bag. We were camping at 5 degrees centigrade in Chile. My wife and I froze the whole night. Because the bag is so big, there is plenty of room to move around, but also plenty of room for cold air to enter. I would guess that this sleeping bag is usable down to 10 degrees centigrade only. Lower than that and you'll be cold. UPDATE: The owner of the company contacted me and offered me a refund and a $25 Amazon certificate. I thought that was fantastic customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Passion Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sleeping bag!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this sleeping bag because we wanted to get out more often and see what wonderful nature has to offer, I have a family of four and we all had our own bags, but me and my wife always sleep together and it was hard in 2 sleeping bags, so I looked up sleeping bags for 2 and this one came up. Glad i bought this cause its everything we want. Theirs plenty of room with 2 people in it, and its very warm. Over all we are pleased with this product and if we ever need another one we will surely buy this one again!
customer_reviews.author: Tiger

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent sleeping bag! I’m a big guy so I bought this sleeping bag just for me, and I really enjoyed using it last night in Death Valley National Park (October). I found it warm, but not too warm. Very comfortable. Love how roomy it is, I can see how it could definitely accommodate two adults. Overall a great sleeping bag. I wasn’t a fan of the included travel pillows, but hey- they didn’t cost extra and the sleeping bag is an excellent value. I look forward to using this sleeping bag on future camping trips.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Feet got cold at night
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the first time during camping trip. It's actually comfortable when you're not smelling like firewood and shame from falling 20times during wake boarding. The only thing was my feet got really cold in the morning. For the most part it did keep my upper body warm. I like the size because i don't feel as claustrophobic with the normal size sleeping bags.
customer_reviews.author: FireballMushRoomTail

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price !
customer_reviews.text: Before writing this review I noticed that this sleeping bag rates 4.8 (out of 5 stars) on Amazon reviews. Well, I will give it a full 5, especially considering the price ! It is roomy, comfortable, and the zippers don't jam up. When using it in temperatures below 45 degrees we add one blanket and stay warm. This bag would be a great value without the pillows, but they are a nice addition . . . the pillows are very small and they work well as knee and elbow pillows . . . you will probably want to add larger pillows. I would buy this bag again or feel good about gifting it. Try it and you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Data

customer_reviews.title: It was definitely better than the big ones we purchased previously
customer_reviews.text: This folds up really well considering it’s size. It was definitely better than the big ones we purchased previously. One night we camped, it got down into the low 40s, and this did NOT keep us warm enough. For regular summer camping however, it was fine. My reasoning for 4 stars is the temp issue mentioned above and because washing it is really annoying— I threw it in the washer after a 10-day camping trip, but that was against the tag’s suggestions. It washed fine, but the recommendations for how not to wash it are numerous.
customer_reviews.author: AMR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for summer camping!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this double sleeping bag to go tent camping in the desert. We were tight on space and didn't have a pad underneath but were still comfortable enough. It fits into a small package but puffs up when taken out. It's also very lightweight. The material is nice and the zippers were fine. We've only used it once so I can't comment on the wear right now but it seemed well-made to withstand many seasons of camping. My husband and I fit comfortable inside with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel Chabot

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with the fact that it saves on space since ...
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this sleeping bag for camping. I am in love with the fact that it saves on space since it is double and 2 people can use it. The storage bag is nice too. Both my husband and I have a zipper to use (that way you don't have to disturb the other person when getting up). The material is soft and kept us both warm. I like how the pillows are able to be stored with the bag itself; however, the pillows were too small for us, so we will continue to take other pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi H

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sleeping bag
customer_reviews.text: Good lightweight sleeping bag that comfortably fit myself and my wife in it. When camping we got a bit of a leak that went directly onto the sleeping bag. Did not soak through and stayed dry all night. Exterior that was wet dried out very fast. The pillows it comes with are very small and more like travel pillows but are soft and comfortable. Packing it back in the bag takes a minute but easy. After a great sleep in it in 85 degree weather. I would definitely recommend this sleeping bag to all who are looking for one.
customer_reviews.author: GW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I am very happy with this product. I think it’s perfect for the casual, only a few time a year, kind of camper! We recently used this on a weekend camping trip and while it is a bit snug with two people in it, it kept us warm and comfy, and in the morning when it got hotter we just unzipped and used it as a blanket! It was a bit of a challenge to get it back into its pack but I’ve found the best way is to not even roll it or fold it or anything, just start stuffing it in and you’ll get there!
customer_reviews.author: Lily A

customer_reviews.title: Warm, but cheap
customer_reviews.text: I loved the warmth and feel of these sleeping bags. We took these on a week long camping trip and by the end of the week both zippers were completely broken. They also measure 52” by 70”, not the advertised size in the description. We plan to reach out to the company and will update the review when we do. I’m disappointed UPDATE: I contacted the company and they have offered a full refund, a gift card and to keep the sleeping bag. I am planning to give them a second chance and am glad the company made things right. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela S.

customer_reviews.title: quality price point -
customer_reviews.text: We just purchased our SECOND sleepingo double bag.We would highly recommend this product ! Our first bag works nicely for our camper as it fits the double bunk perfectly.Both my wife and i are very comfortable in this bag.(I'm 6-4 and 210,-she's 5-4 and a buck twenty.We RV camp in moderate temps(45-75) and add a blanket when it gets colder than 40. I shipped the second bag north for my spring and fall salmon trips.I use the second bag on top of whatever bedding i find at the fish camps.The lightweight construction fits my needs perfectly as i usually sleep with socks and t-shirt _LOVE_EM
customer_reviews.author: Finsandfeathers

customer_reviews.title: Sleepingo.com worth the buy.
customer_reviews.text: We are a rough bunch here loving the outdoor life on our farm and outback in the Adirondacks and beyond. Bought a tent and mattress setup for the back of my Tundra and needed a sleeping bag to fit my wife and I on travel trips. Took a chance and found a great deal on a quality bag through Amazon and your company. Absolutely delighted with the warmth and feel of comfort your bag provides and look forward to testing it's long term durability against it's lifetime warranty. Thank you for your very reasonable price for such quality. Steven Wood
customer_reviews.author: Steven A. Wood

customer_reviews.title: No question. BuyThis Bag
customer_reviews.text: Wow this is an exceptional buy. I received this sleeping bag and couldn't wait to check it out as i was going camping at a State Park this weekend amd temperature is supposed to drop at night. It was packed good and arrived in excellent condition. I quickly loaded it with my camping gear and waited for the weekend. I arrived at the park and set up camp and opened the sleeping bag and joined them per instructions. I have to tell you the temps dropped into the forties and i was warm and snug in that sleeping bag. Plenty of room and pure comfort. I will alwsys recommend this seller.
customer_reviews.author: MIKEY

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty good. I love that it can be used as one double, or two singles. It isn't very thick, but a fleece liner and remedy very cold nights. We have used it on night's near 30 degrees and been ok if we sleep with sweatpants/shirts. I think the double body heat helps, too. One thing I didn't care for about camping was not being able to sleep near my wife. This was the answer, and it didn't break the bank. Three little pillows are nearly useless.
customer_reviews.author: Thinny J

customer_reviews.title: Summer bag only
customer_reviews.text: The bag zips together and can be used as two bags. The material is comfortable. However....this is a summer bag, sorry. Maybe comfortable to 40degrees Fahrenheit. We went to Yellowstone with it last June and the temperature dropped to freezing...and we froze. The other issue is that when separated the bags zippers don’t stay closed. This is sort of a good thing because you can get out easily. There are Velcro tabs to secure it zipped up but they don’t work when the bag is separate. One bag has the hook side the other has the loop. The price is pretty sweet though.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon S.

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS YOUR SIGN! ✨SUPPORT SMALL BUSSINESSES!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because we were looking for something lightweight, convenient and comfy. We LOVED it. We keep it in our car for emergencies and it's great for impromptu camping trips. It's so comforting to know that you both are close to eachother while sleeping BUT you still have so much room to move over a bit if that's what you like. If you've been looking around Amazon for HOURS (like me) - this is your sign!✨ *Lightweight *Convenient *Packs small *Fits 2 (could maybe fit a kid between you) -I'm 5'2 and he's 6'2 *Approx. the size of a full bedset SUPPORT SMALL BUSSINESSES!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan S.

customer_reviews.title: If you're looking for a double sleeping bag, this is it!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this sleeping bag!! Traditional sleeping bags are so constricting but I couldn't sprawl out in this one and still stay toasty warm. I love that my dog was able to cuddle with me in the sleeping bag, too. Once my boyfriend came to camp, we both slept so comfortably! This sleeping bag is extremely compact. Honestly, it isn't much bigger than a single bag. My parents have zip-together bags and they are huge! I'm in love with this product and I'm sad camping season is ending!
customer_reviews.author: Chanelle Minor

customer_reviews.title: Warm weather queen sleeping bag for tent use
customer_reviews.text: First, I really like the stuffing bag. It is sturdy and the bag and extra liner I bought fit well inside; the straps make it easy to move and pack. This is definitely a summer bag, not warm enough for cold weather. It breathes well, keeping body dry. I have not tested the waterproof claim. It will need some sort of additional cover to make it suitable for cold weather. I can manage a search for what will make it adapt to cold weather use. I am basically happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is warm, light and perfect for 2.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for me and my wife when we go camping. It is a hassle to take blankets or trying to connect sleeping bags that do not go together and so this bag was a perfect solution. The bag is light but warm. It can roll up into a small carry bag and is quite durable. We fit easily into this roomy 2 person bag and are very pleased with the choice at this great price. We are looking to possibly get it as a gift for family members.
customer_reviews.author: Manofmany tastes

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sleeping bag for my first planned camping trip! Unfortunately, due to this pandemic my camping trip got cancelled. I was really looking forward to using it outdoor. I did, however, took it out of the bag and slept on it for a bit. It's soft, light, and comfy. I love it that it comes with two cute little pillows too. One thing I would like to mention is that if you're a medium sized or slightly bigger person, or just someone who likes space when you're sleeping, this sleeping bag might not fit you and another person.
customer_reviews.author: Francie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality sleeping bag
customer_reviews.text: This sleeping bag is awesome- it is well made and great quality. What I love most about it is its versatility. We brought it on a trip for 2 weeks from Colorado to Moab and it was perfect in any weather- it dropped to around 25-30 degrees where we were and it was plenty warm, and it was also perfect when it was 50-60 overnight in Moab. The stitching is high quality and most importantly the zipper is high quality. It's easy to get back in the bag which is usually a pet peeve of mine when bags aren't abler to fit easily. The added bonus was the two little pillows! This should last a long time. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Sangiolo

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: The Sleepingo Double Sleeping bag was just what I was looking for. A durable, quality sleeping bag that my boyfriend and I could share when we go camping together. I love the forest green color. The inside fabric is soft but it would have been nice if this was offered in flannel as an option. The two travelling pillows are a very nice touch and the travel bag is great and comes with two crossing straps that can be tightened down to keep the sleeping bag from popping out of its bag. I can't wait to use this on our next camping trip!
customer_reviews.author: Francine

customer_reviews.title: so it is great on space as well
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I used this for our first camping trip in 10 years. We were in the mountains in Southern California and it got down to about 40F overnight and neither one of us was cold. In fact, we did not have to bundle up too much to stay warm. The pillows are a little small but make due for a night or two of camping. The double sleeping bag we purchased actually folds up smaller than our old single sleeping bags, so it is great on space as well.
customer_reviews.author: eze2525

customer_reviews.title: A lot of value here.
customer_reviews.text: Spent 2 nights out camping out with the wife. About 43 degrees at night for a low so it was uncomfortably chilly. First night she used this double sleeping bag and I being much smarter than her used a much more expensive quilt. Long story short she slept like a rock and I froze. Second night we shared the double bag and both got a good nights sleep. This bag is definitely worth a look if you have a significant other or, if like me, you find traditional sleeping bags too constricting. I’m probably going to buy another one just to have as a backup.
customer_reviews.author: Tyronne E. Doram

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC SLEEPING BAG FOR TWO!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our camping trip was planned a year ago, consequently we had time to prepare & compare products. We ordered this sleeping bag even tho our cabin was fully equipped with linens,etc. Due to the Covid-19 virus, we brought a fitted bottom sheet to cover the original mattress, then covered it with this double sleeping bag, used our own two pillows & cases. It was PERFECT!!! The bag was light weight, served the purpose & we would buy it again, for our family members. And, getting it back into the bag wasn't a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Marie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Roomy for a very tall man!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit! I purchased this double sleeping bag as a bridal shower gift. The fiancee is 6ft 5". He has been looking for an extra long double sleeping bag. Andrew was present when the gift was open and he took it out...unrolled it...a snuggled inside! IT WAS PERFECT!!! He was able to pull it up over his head! Soft. Comfy. Roomy. Warm. Bought them an extra tall tent. They are going camping in October. Andrew thanked me on Facebook and by text.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sleeping bags!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it seemed liked an honest company with a good product. I would have to agree on both! The bag is everything stated and I would highly recommend it. Ive used it down to 48 degrees so far and slept comfortably, washed it 4 times now with no seam rippage or damaged areas, and its super compact for its size! I can fit the queen into my backpack along with a sleeping pillow no problem! Great company and product! I will buy again 100%
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Walls

customer_reviews.title: Car Camping for a couple
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this sleeping bag a couple of months before the actual trip to the mountains. We did a car camping and this sleeping bag held up really well until 45F! The car itself was getting cold from inside, but the bag didn’t let down! We cuddled up in the trunk and slept like babies through the night! It has zippers on each side which is VERY comfortable! I would definitely use a solid sleeping pad so you don’t sleep cold. It isn’t meant to help with convection heat loss, so think ahead about insulation :) Love it and thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great Sleeping bag!
customer_reviews.text: Took this camping and slept in a tent for the first time in 25 years! Always had campers or motor homes lol This bag is absolutely amazing! Comes in a nice bag, very light weight. It’s big, big enough for my two grand children they slept with me! Plenty of room they are 9 and 7. They loved the bag! So soft and comfortable they wanted to take it home! Looking forward to using it in the back of my SUV this winter going to sand dunes and fishing in Montana! Love the bag! Great customer service I even received a nice personal note from Coy the owner after purchasing it ! Amazing! I will buy from them again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great roomy sleeping bag
customer_reviews.text: I camped with my little boy in our backyard. It fit us both well. Very soft, warm, and roomy. I bought it with intentions of using it with him. The temperature was chilly, in the high 50° but we were warm. We both like curl up in blankets and it was soft enough to scrunch up and racoon ourselves. The only issue was trying to roll it tight enough to get it back into it\'s case. It took a few tries.
customer_reviews.author: Jtrob

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sleeping bag. Super comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sleeping bag because I have two small children and they love jumping in bed with their mum and dad. So I figured that it would be useful when we go camping. I just got back from the Gorge (no kids on this trip) and spent three super comfy nights in the sleeping bag. It's warm, huge, and very plush. Would definitely recommend it. Looking forward to using it on other camping trips with my kids. Nice follow-up after the purchase from Coy, the owner of Sleepingo. Coy sent me a nice note checking to see if I enjoyed using the sleeping bag. Great customer service. Thanks Coy!
customer_reviews.author: DJ Pawly D

customer_reviews.title: Very warm and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I took this on a camping trip on the beach in Alaska - even though it's summer, it gets windy and cold at night. There is more than enough room for two - we both stayed warm and comfortable. Great experience for a couple nights sleep outdoors. It was so light I was worried we wouldn't be warm enough but it was great. I did sleep with a sweater on also, but it was like 45 degrees F and windy right on the river. Just FYI. Awesome outdoor summer sleeping bag, although I've only used it that once.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight Sleeping Bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sleeping bag with 2 pillows to keep in my office, and whenever the need arises for an afternoon nap I just pull it out of a drawer, lock the door, and lay down for a nap. The sleeping bag is 100% perfect for that. Lightweight, but just thick enough to keep me warm. Now the pillows are a different story. They are too small, and are very hard. Thus, they are really not comfortable, which meant I had to take a pillow from home.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Broyles

customer_reviews.title: I say get it!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got back from a 2 night mountain backpacking trip just off the Pacific North Trail. Night time temp were in the high 30°. I did bring a fleece liner for myself knowing the weather would be cold. But was 100% satisfied with this sleeping bag! Stayed warm. It is pretty light for a two person. People just need to understand that the low rated temp does not mean it will keep you warm at that temp, but it will keep you alive at that temp! As I said I added a light fleece blanket that weighed .5 oz rolled up. Both my husband and I are very happy with this purchase! !!!
customer_reviews.author: I&N+4

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag for giants
customer_reviews.text: Sleeping bag is fantastic. I’m a big guy at 6’6” 240lbs, and I always run into problems finding a bag I fit into comfortably. This sleeping bag is a dream come true. The bag will work well for 3 seasons, if the temp is under 40 outside I would recommend something a bit more insulated. Weight wise, it will work great if your driving somewhere and setting up camp, but for backpacking, it’s just a little to big 5 star review
customer_reviews.author: Mr. BP

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING Sleeping Bag!
customer_reviews.text: The sleeping bag is made up of very nice material, which was very soft even if you chose to take off the clothes "wink, wink" It attaches to a backpack super easily with its carrying case and it was quite warm. We were sleeping in 20 degree weather (it was rated for 30) and it was fine no problems. I definitely recommend buying something like this as opposed to a 300 dollar sleeping back this was nice warm cozy and light. All id recommend is a sleeping back matt, i didn't take one and felt the rocks underneath, but that is not the sleeping bag's fault. Good Company too Sleepingo, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Yerena

customer_reviews.title: Happy camper.
customer_reviews.text: For a huge double sleeping bag with 2 pillows, the packaging was surprising small. I was also pleasantly surprised that I could pack it back into the tote bag quite easily. The manufacturing and materials were very good. And most importantly, the bag was comfortable with zippers on both sides for easy access and temperature control for both me and my wife. I put it on an air mattress and I felt like I was as snug as sleeping in a queen size bed at home while actually camping in a tent.
customer_reviews.author: C. Gilfillan

customer_reviews.title: Compact, for all Glamping Trips.
customer_reviews.text: Used for camping. It rolls up nicely for the size, 2 people. Compact and I need the room for a 2 door Wrangler. This Sleepingo will be going with us, next trip. It was good for 40 degree temps at night with the rite clothing. This Sleepingo will be great as an outer layer for the two bulky sleeping bags we have, at colder temps. This Sleepingo will be going on all glamping trips. Nice Compact, washed up nice, follow instructions, no problem. Love it! Thank You! Drys fast, lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for 2 people
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fit for 2 adults. It kept us warm enough on a 40 degree night, and I think it could have kept us warm even if it had been a little colder. I think 3 would be a tight fit, but that could just add to the warmth. Works out really great when used as a single sleeping bag also, though not as warm, so I think 40 degrees would be about as low as I'd go when in "single bag" mode. And considering that it is just a little bigger than the size of a single sleeping bag, the amount of space and weight you save with this are very much worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Juan M

customer_reviews.title: Updated my review
customer_reviews.text: Not waterproof like it claimed in the product video. I sprinkled water on it and it went right through. And also the package box, it seems like it was opened, taped up like a returned item. Not happy with this purchase and I'm returning it for a refund. UPDATED REVIEW: The first product received was not as expected but the owner of Sleepingo was quick to make things right and shpped me another same product and this time it's better. The owner gave me a refund and let me keep the first one received. Great customer service and delivered the right product, prompt me to recommend Sleepingo company to my friends and business associates. Very satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: M M Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for a resonable price.
customer_reviews.text: We used this camping in a cabin in GA in noveber but we had a heater in the cabin. It kept us plenty warm and having zippers on both sides made it easy for each of us to get in and out of. Those pillows though are a waist of the companies materials. I didnt know it came with pillows so it gave us a good laugh. They were super thin small little bags. But I didnt buy it for the "pillows". We did enjoy the sleeping bag. I probably wont be doing any hiking with it due to size, but it's a nice two person sleeping bag that saves a little room in the trunk traveling.
customer_reviews.author: DandyDame

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Roll!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite part of this sleeping bag is how well it packs. If you're used to rolling things up for camping, this sleeping bag will go back into the original bag with ease! To use it to it's maximum point, you\'re going to definitely need to dress well and set up your tent and sleep area well. But I expected this with camping in the cold. You ca\'t just do one thing right and be fine, you have to do a handful of things to stay warm. That being said, this bag definitely performs as it says. I only got down into the 50's and it was about perfect, but I was wearing next to nothing for warmth.
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and comfort for camping, hiking, and sleep overs
customer_reviews.text: This was a last minute purchase for us before a family camping trip and my wife and I are so pleased with our Sleepingo Double Sleeping Bag. The bag provided a higher level of comfort and space than any sleeping bag we have used previously. The area we were staying in was cold but we were both able to warm up and cuddle in our Sleepingo bag. I would highly recommend this product if you're looking for something durable and spacious.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Great Double Sleeping bag
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to put in our Cabin Cruiser for the both of us to sleep in. He's 6 foot and I am 5'3. It fit snug but good. Cozy. Not too hot but kept us warm. The only thing and it was me not reading the directions, it came with 2 little pillows that poofed up in the dryer. I am having a hard time getting them to flatten back out. But that was my error. Other than that, this sleeping bag is comfortable and perfect for our boat.
customer_reviews.author: lilangelsmom

customer_reviews.title: Can not beat the price & quality
customer_reviews.text: The sleeping bag is everything it’s advertised to be, I’m very pleased with the overall quality and the comfort, it comes with a very nice bag and is light enough to roll back up and put away very quickly . The pillows that come with it are extremely small as you would expect so for a larger person you’re probably not the most ideal however it was very nice to have them included. I would highly recommend this for anybody that’s looking for a lightweight sleeping bag and I’m sure I’ll be getting many years of enjoyment from it .
customer_reviews.author: Warren J. Bachmann

customer_reviews.title: We did use feet warmers and hand warmers and a couple extra fleece blankets inside the sleeping bag and we stayed nice and warm
customer_reviews.text: We used our new sleepingo double size sleeping bag last weekend camping. We slept in a tent and it was 28 degrees outside. Even though this sleeping bag was only marketed for 40 degrees, it worked well. We did use feet warmers and hand warmers and a couple extra fleece blankets inside the sleeping bag and we stayed nice and warm. I would highly recommend this 2 person double size sleeping bag. We did try and use them as individual sleeping bags the second night, but it functions must better used as a 2 person bag (body heat people) :)
customer_reviews.author: dlh1550

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with this item.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a camping trip that my husband had taken, it had been about 10 yrs since the last time we wented. We were very disappointed with the sleeping bag worst nights sleep we ever had. Yes it was light weight but not a queen size more like full size and very slippery it kept sliding all over the air mattress and turned so I ended up sleeping on zipper. Second night I tried leaving just bottom zippered and use as a blanket, it slipped and I ended up just on the air mattress. my husband was very upset with this, so we returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for two adults as a whole.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I like it. Compared to my queen size bed, it is 2-3 inches smaller than my comforter in all directions. It is comfortably padded and goes well with my cot. I sleep face up or down, so the two camping pillows were great. You can take this and make two separate sleeping bags, but it is a tight fit for a man of 5'9" and 180 lbs. The half bag was perfect for my children to use. The whole sleeping system was perfect for two, if you like each other.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Replacing my expensive bags
customer_reviews.text: This double sleeping bag fits perfectly over my queen air mattress. This bag is replacing our Rei siesta bags that were 4x the price. Material was soft and kept us the perfect temperature throughout the summer months. You may need extra layers for colder weather. I would recommend packing your own pillow though. I'm not an expert bag roller, so I have a bit of trouble getting it back into its carrying pack. However, I do like the carrying pack as it has a lot of straps making it easier to grab and carry. The pack also has a lot of buckles to further compress the sleeping bag once it's inside the carrying pack. Overall great purchase and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: M. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Quality isn't great - Customer service is AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: The seller generously reached out and refunded our order because we were not satisfied. Great customer service from a small shop. This bag would be great for shorter people, kids or teens as it can be zipped to form two regular sized sleeping bags. This was a replacement for one we loved that was stolen and the quality was underwhelming. It worked in a pinch but we'll be purchasing the original one we had again: TETON Sports Mammoth Queen Size Flannel Lined Sleeping Bag (94"x 62", Grey, +20 Degree F)
customer_reviews.author: Carissa

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, warm, and wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Used in a pop up rv in the NC mountains during April and slept like a baby. Humid cold is a problem, and after two years of freezing my bum off at Merlefest (bluegrass music festival) I had had enough. I bought this for my boyfriend and I to use and it exceeded expectations. It’s super lightweight, warm, and I love the feature where it split into two. It’s nice to shave one item that will work for multiple situations. I’m super pleased with my purchase from such a wonderful company.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Cool design but cheap materials
customer_reviews.text: its great looking and I love the double zippers but the material really feels cheap, it made me sweat all night and I am the least sweaty sleeper on the planet. Even just having it on top of my body or leaning back against it made me sweaty. Its a terrible feeling and im definitely returning it. It may have to do with it being water proof so if you don't need it to be water proof, I would pick something else. I was really excited about this becaue the design of it was just what I wanted. The materials used was the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredible value!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I camp quite a bit and there are some nights I wish I could cuddle up with him, especially those colder nights (: I finally did some research and bought the Sleepingo double sleeping bag and it is perfect! We love that we can cuddle or have our own space just like in a real bed and it’s even a perfect fit when sleeping in the back of our car. The best part is, when we have guests, we can turn it into two sleeping bags for extra campers!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect warm weather family sleeping bag
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for an easy warm weather sleeping bag this will work for you: fits two adults or three kids Great for sleepovers or light camping Soft material Easy to pack and clean afterwards can be unzipped and becomes two blankets light weight minimal packing space - I use this bag for my kids when we are on a camping trip or friends sleep over best for indoors or summer camping trips.
customer_reviews.author: JpR

customer_reviews.title: Top notch product and company!
customer_reviews.text: Bag is as described, went camping and the temp was in the low 40's and stayed warm all night. Also VERY easy to get back into included compression sack. Would highly recommend and also unsurpassed customer service and communication!
customer_reviews.author: JR W.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and warm!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item for our first backpacking experience. We went someplace pretty cold and this sleeping bag kept us pretty warm. It came in a quality carrying bag (which is a plus) and we liked the overall quality of this product. What impressed me the most is that the owner reached out to me on three occasions asking if the product had met my expectations and willing to rectify any problems if I had them. That, to me, is quality customer service as well. The product far exceeded my expectations and so did the company.
customer_reviews.author: Yami V. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great size for bigger guys plus extra room
customer_reviews.text: Most "single" adult sleeping bags seem to be made for the size I was when I was 12. Certainly there are full grown adults who are that size, but as a 6' stocky built man such a petite sleeping bag is woefully insufficient. This was my choice for a "one and then some" sleeping bag, it would probably fit me and my 5'2 wife but she isn't much of a camper. This is the perfect size for a full size air mattress.
customer_reviews.author: invidious

customer_reviews.title: the inside material feels good against my skin
customer_reviews.text: I have a Sprinter conversion RV van and needed a way to stay warm while sleeping. I've used it for two trips and found this sleeping bag to warm up quickly (but not too hot) with just my body heat. Also, the inside material feels good against my skin. One more thing that I love is the length of the sleeping bag. The lower portion of the bag is longer than the top which gives my head and pillow a place thats protected. I would also say that the quality of the materials feel like they will last for years of normal use. I bought the green color sleeping bag (love the color).
customer_reviews.author: G P

customer_reviews.title: Just What We Were Looking For
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a double sleeping bag with enough actual room for two people. We went camping earlier this fall and were so cold and miserable I nearly swore off camping altogether. The compromise was to get a double bag so I wouldn't be freezing and actually stood and chance of sleeping and this sleeping bag did not disappoint. It's super soft and warm; not too bulky. While it would be too much weight for an extended backwoods trip, it is perfect for a short trek in or a drive up camping spot. The price was affordable and I'm glad we got this!
customer_reviews.author: ReeseLing

customer_reviews.title: Good double sleeping bag
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our mini trailer. We have used it 3 times and once with below freezing temps. It works great. Has zippers on both sides to get in and out. Is very comfortable and warm. It stuffs easily into the stuff bag for storage. It came with two small pillows which may be ok for tent camping or for kids, we did not use them. I have unzipped the 2 bags and I was able to zip them back together without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great sleeping bag!extremely light weight and compacts in to a small bag. I used it once for a beach sleepover and held up nice. My daughter and I slept comfortably in it. The seller is great! Shipping was lighting fast and I would definitely recommend this seller. I forgot to take pictures but will be going on a camping trip soon and will upload some pics. I will also purchase 2 more for my older 2 children.
customer_reviews.author: Katia

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and cozy!
customer_reviews.text: After seeing all the other positive reviews, I decided to give this sleeping bag a try for a camping trip. We have a Jeep, so we set up the back of it as our resting area. It got really cold during the night and this sleeping bag kept us warm. Come the morning, my hubby and the dog were reluctant to get out of it. This is worth every penny, and I would recommend this to anyone who might go camping at colder places.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Super convienent
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this sleeping bag. I use it when I go hammock tenting. The little pillow that comes with it seems insignificant, buts its enough to keep you sleeping at night in a hammock. As for temperature control, I have to put a piece of padding between the hammock and the sleeping bag to keep the cold chill off my back. Rolling it back up is pretty easy. I have not split it into two pieces, but lots of leg room for me. I am 6ft tall and I sleep well in it; I like covering my head when I sleep and I can do that with this.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Hartel

customer_reviews.title: Everything To Like In A Sleeping Bag
customer_reviews.text: After using my Sleepingo sleeping bag on a few camping trips, Sleepingo rates as one of the best sleeping bags I've owned. Lightweight? Yep! In cold weather, I was completely comfortable. In warm weather, I appreciate that its not a heavy object laying on top of me and I'm not uncomfortable in any way. Great zipper too.
customer_reviews.author: MJS

customer_reviews.title: Nice! Kept me warm.
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this sleeping bag for a bachelor party camping trip. We are new to camping gear but we wanted something that would be good quality and last for years. We are happy with this sleeping bag! It kept my husband warm on his trip although he was the only one in the double bag. It’s spacious enough for both of us to share on future trips as well! Compact for a double bag and comfortable. Glad we chose this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size, Comfort, and Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this item and wish I'd ordered two at the time I purchased because now they are not currently available. This is very comfortable and packs up small enough for convenient storage in my small RV. The seller contacted me when it shipped and when I replied, contacted me again. I was and am impressed all around. Thanks for such a great product and positive buying experience.
customer_reviews.author: Trish G

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sleeping bag for campouts. Used it several times now on several camping trips. Its big, fits me perfectly and leaves room to stretch out a bit. Keeps me warm on cold nights and has enough padding to make even hard ground feel good. For the price, this is a really great product. Seems and construction all look great and it has held up after months of use and storage. Highly recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Constance

customer_reviews.title: Really Warm
customer_reviews.text: Hello, I used this sleeping bag as my regular sleeping bed. I could not sleep at mattress as the mattress causes my back pain. The bag is really soft and it keep me really warm under low temperature, so that I can keep my room temperature warm. Me and my husband, both are comfortable in this sleeping bad. The sleeping bag is so slippery that when we wake up, we can not find ourselves at the same position of the bed room. Our room floor in wooden. But, one thing I felt, I need something to cover my head and ear. That's it.
customer_reviews.author: Debsree M.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, roomy, and warm!
customer_reviews.text: I am an avid camper and typically do not use sleeping bags for myself because they make me feel like I'm being squeezed. I bought this sleeping bag because I really needed something more compact to travel with but wanted something roomy. I was a little skeptical about how it would hold up in the cold, but it was just perfect. It was very comfortable and light, while being able to still keep me warm. I also like that I can take it apart and make 2 separate sleeping bags out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole V.

product_meta.title: Sleepingo Double Sleeping Bag for Backpacking, Camping, Or Hiking, Queen Size XL! Cold Weather 2 Person Waterproof Sleeping Bag for Adults Or Teens. Truck, Tent, Or Sleeping Pad, Lightweight
feature_bullets: SUPER WARM AND MOST COMFORTABLE! YOU WILL LOVE THIS SLEEPING BAG! Want to sleep comfortably, anywhere? No need to suffer with a cheap, cold, tight sleeping bag! This quality, portable bag is perfect. Super sturdy and extremely comfortable.

THIS SUPER SOFT, HUGE, WARM & COMFY SLEEPING BAG FEATURES A LIFETIME WARRANTY! – Economically and practically efficient; With an impressive size of 87" X 59" This sleeping bag sleeps two adults in ample and comfort.

FOR COLD CLIMATE CONDITIONS [32° Up] PERFECT FOR HIKING, CAMPING, TRAVELING & MORE! No tearing due to tight conditions, No shivering due to heat loss, very convenient to carry. You’ll wish you found this years ago, comes with 2 traveling pillows!
CAN BE USED AS TWO INDIVIDUAL SLEEPING BAGS! -Designed to be used as one large queen size sleeping bag or as two individual sleeping bags. Imagine the memories you’ll make with this.

TOUGH AND DURABLE OUTER SHELL, SOFT SILKY EXTREMELY COMFY INNER LINING! -The outer shell is made of super strong waterproof and camping grade polyester fabric, each square inch of fabric packs a 210 thread count, designed to last a lifetime in the most severe conditions, The inner lining is made of a textile combination of Tetron and Cotton for that awesome cozy feeling.
